argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lindslinind.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` M ) |
| 2 |  | lindslinind.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | lindslinind.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | lindslinind.z | |- Z = ( 0g ` M ) |
| 5 |  | lindslinind.y | |- Y = ( ( invg ` R ) ` ( f ` x ) ) |
| 6 |  | lindslinind.g | |- G = ( f |` ( S \ { x } ) ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_lmodfgrp | |- ( M e. LMod -> R e. Grp ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( S e. V /\ M e. LMod ) -> R e. Grp ) |
| 9 |  | #P_elmapi | |- ( f e. ( B ^m S ) -> f : S --> B ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ffvelrn | |- ( ( f : S --> B /\ x e. S ) -> ( f ` x ) e. B ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_a1d | |- ( ( f : S --> B /\ x e. S ) -> ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) -> ( f ` x ) e. B ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_ex | |- ( f : S --> B -> ( x e. S -> ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) -> ( f ` x ) e. B ) ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( f e. ( B ^m S ) -> ( x e. S -> ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) -> ( f ` x ) e. B ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_com13 | |- ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) -> ( x e. S -> ( f e. ( B ^m S ) -> ( f ` x ) e. B ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_3imp | |- ( ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) /\ x e. S /\ f e. ( B ^m S ) ) -> ( f ` x ) e. B ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` R ) = ( invg ` R ) |
| 17 | 2, 16 | #P_grpinvcl | |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ ( f ` x ) e. B ) -> ( ( invg ` R ) ` ( f ` x ) ) e. B ) |
| 18 | 8, 15, 17 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( ( S e. V /\ M e. LMod ) /\ ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) /\ x e. S /\ f e. ( B ^m S ) ) ) -> ( ( invg ` R ) ` ( f ` x ) ) e. B ) |
| 19 | 5, 18 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ( ( S e. V /\ M e. LMod ) /\ ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) /\ x e. S /\ f e. ( B ^m S ) ) ) -> Y e. B ) |
